thread.title: Firstsource call centre firm creates 380 jobs in Cardiff
thread.title_full: Firstsource call centre firm creates 380 jobs in Cardiff - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Firstsource call centre firm creates 380 jobs in Cardiff
text: More than 380 call centre jobs are being created in Cardiff by Indian-owned Firstsource. The firm will open its second Cardiff office, in the city centre, after it won two new customer service contracts. One hundred of the 387 new jobs have been filled. Economy Minister Edwina Hart said the expansion showed Wales was an ideal location " for companies wishing to grow their business " . Nearly 1,000 people work at Firstsource in Cardiff Bay, opened in 2012. Share this story About sharing
